Package ci

Class CIServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ci.CIServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpHandler
    public class CIServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpHandler
    Continuous integration server implementation. Handles push events by Github. Compiles/tests commits and generates commit status checks. Sends email notifications regarding build status.

    • Field Summary

      java.lang.String GITHUB_TOKEN

      • createCommitStatuses

        public static void createCommitStatuses​(java.lang.String repo,
                                        java.lang.String owner,
                                        org.json.simple.JSONArray commits,
                                        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean> isBuildSuccessful,
                                        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean> areTestsSuccessful,
                                        java.lang.String github_token)
        Makes a POST request to Github's api endpoint for setting the status of a commit.
        Parameters:
        repo - name of repository
        owner - name of owner of repository
        commits - a JSONArray object of the commits in the push event
        isBuildSuccessful - an arraylist of booleans representing whether the commit of an index built successfully
        github_token - used to authorize the Github user making the request (user hosting the server).

      • createURL

        public static java.net.URL createURL​(java.lang.String owner,
                                     java.lang.String repo,
                                     java.lang.String sha)
        Creates and returns a URL object for Github's api endpoint for creating commit statuses
        Parameters:
        owner - name of repo owner
        repo - name of repository
        sha - of specific commit
        Returns:
        URL object for api endpoint

      • getCommits

        public static org.json.simple.JSONArray getCommits​(org.json.simple.JSONObject body)

      • processCommits

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean> processCommits​(org.json.simple.JSONArray commits,
                                                                    java.lang.String buildLogsDir,
                                                                    java.lang.String owner,
                                                                    java.lang.String repo,
                                                                    ci.CIServer.Action action)
        Builds or tests each commit sent in a push request.
        Parameters:
        commits - a JSONArray of the commits in a push request
        owner - name of owner of the repository
        repo - name of the repository
        action - represents the action to take for a commit. Can be BUILD or TEST.
        Returns:
        an arraylist representing whether a commit was built successfully. Index corresponds to commit in given array.

      • cloneRepo

        public static void cloneRepo​(java.lang.String repoName,
                             java.lang.String targetDir)
        Clone a github repository into a chosen directory.
        Parameters:
        repoName - name of repository.
        targetDir - name of directory that repo is cloned into.

      • processCommit

        public static java.lang.String processCommit​(java.lang.String owner,
                                             java.lang.String repo,
                                             java.lang.String buildLogsDir,
                                             java.lang.String dir,
                                             java.lang.String sha,
                                             ci.CIServer.Action action)
        Builds or tests an individual commit.
        Parameters:
        dir - name of directory where repository exists.
        sha - string of the sha of the commit.
        action - determines whether commit should be built or tested.
        Returns:
        the log produced while testing or building commit.

        public static void setRepoVersion​(java.lang.String dir,
                                  java.lang.String sha)
        Sets the repository version to the specified commit.
        Parameters:
        dir - local directory of the repository
        sha - sha string of the commit

        Send email to the branch owner to notify the build results.
        Parameters:
        owner - name of the branch
        commits - a JSONArray of the commits in a push request
        isBuildSuccessful - an arraylist representing whether a commit was built successfully.
